attributes.action: Reduce the interest rate on Student Loans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should so called "cheap" student loans not be reduced as part of current emergency measures? Why should student interest rates increase in line with inflation when all benefits, government employee pay rises, etc etc are restricted to well below current inflation rates? Don't wait until next September act now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
